challenge.title: Miller Puckette - Computer Music OCW
challenge.description: Miller Puckette's Computer Music Open Courseware is a further introduction to computer synthesis and Pure Data.
challenge.instructions: Watch Miller Puckettes's Pure Data tutorial on UC San Diego, then program some songs!
